thread.title: Maryland unveils throwback uniforms for Penn State game
thread.title_full: Maryland unveils throwback uniforms for Penn State game

author: Daniel Gallen
title: Maryland unveils throwback uniforms for Penn State game
text:
var ssaUrl = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'pixel.sitescout.com/iap/0ea84626951144d2';new Image().src = ssaUrl;"/> Tracking the Terps Sports Terps Tracking the Terps Maryland unveils throwback uniforms for Penn State game 
Maryland will wear 1961-inspired throwback uniforms for Saturday's game against Penn State at M&T Bank Stadium, the school announced Monday . According to the university, the inspiration for the uniforms comes from Maryland's uniforms worn during the 1961 season. On Nov. 4 of that year, the Terps defeated Penn State, 21-17, in College Park. Daniel Gallen Contact Reporter Maryland will wear 1961-inspired throwback jerseys for Saturday's game against Penn State. 
Maryland will wear 1961-inspired throwback uniforms for Saturday's game against Penn State at M&T Bank Stadium, the school announced Monday . 
While Under Armour has been known to make big splashes with its Maryland-flag inspired uniforms over the past five years, the Terps' throwbacks are more understated, featuring block numbers on the jerseys and helmets. 
According to a release, the inspiration for the uniforms comes from Maryland's uniforms worn during the 1961 season. On Nov. 4 of that year, the Terps defeated Penn State, 21-17, in College Park. Before last season, that was Maryland's only victory against the Nittany Lions. Penn State leads the all-time series, 35-2-1. 
Previously this season, Maryland added new black and white hand-painted helmets to its "black ops" and "white ops" looks.
